summary: This mod will add two new weapons and armors, a light and a heavy armors set, with shinobi/ninja in mind.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi - Weapons and Armors - Multilanguage
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Small description:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]This mod will add two new weapons and armors, a light and a heavy armors set, with shinobi/ninja in mind.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Long description:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]You can craft both set at the forge/anvil and at the tanning rack (for the Jingasa and for the light Jingasa).
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]You can temper and enchant both set.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Available for both male and femele, should work with all the vanilla races (only tested on a Orc, a Dunmer, and a Nord, for now).
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]The armors and the swords would require:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]You only need some leather and some leather strips, and some iron ingot(s), too.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]For the stats, please look at the "Images" section.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]You can also use the console command (²) and search for:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]help "shinobi"
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]player.additem IDIDIDID 1
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Not required (No perk, no DLC or anything required):
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]You only need to have Skyrim, no perk, no DLC or anything required.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Item list - Armors:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Boots,
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Gloves,
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Jerkin,
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Jingasa,
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Shoes,
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Boots (Light),
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Gloves (Light),
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Jerkin (Light),
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Jingasa (Light),
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Shoes (Light).
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Item list - Weapons:[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Sword,
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Shinobi Sword (Light).
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Language:
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]ENG
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]FR
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]ATM
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Credits:
Bilwit - Texture Wizard
TheDahaka - MOIAF - Mods Of Ice And Fire

Th3Wick3d1 - Witcher 2 - Viper Assassin-Blue Stripes-Roche-Ves
Donker316 - Game of Thrones Armor Compilation
[b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Leucippe [/size][/color][/font][/i][/b]- Tenue de moine errant vagrant monk outfit
[b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Leucippe [/size][/color][/font][/i][/b]- A little bit of japan
[b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=5]Leucippe And Setvi [/size][/color][/font][/i][/b]- Jingasa - War Hat of Setvi

Permissions, On Using Models/Textures In Your Mod:
All models and textures edited/altered/created here by bilwit & setvi are open source. Be courteous and give credit where credit is due.

[img]http://guidology.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Orc.png[/img]

* Beast races not supported atm...

author: Setvi
